title: Password Protect
label: Password
description: This page is password protected with login guest/guest.
content:
---

Page unlocked!

Password-protect any page in X3 by navigating to "protect" from the admin panel. Simply locate the page you want to password-protect in the link field, add a username and password, and click save. The specific page will now require login when accessed by any visitor. Password-protection is recursive, which means the login for a specific link will inherit upon child pages..
